title: $825 -- Montego Bay, Jamaica: 4-Night All-Inclusive Vacations
text:
Home > Vacation Package Deals > $825 -- Montego Bay, Jamaica: 4-Night All-Inclusive Vacations $825 -- Montego Bay, Jamaica: 4-Night All-Inclusive Vacations by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff - September 23, 2015 at 6:49 PM Tweet 
Liberty Travel is offering four-night all-inclusive escapes to Montego Bay, Jamaica, from $825 per person for select travel dates in November. You'll stay at the Holiday Inn Resort Montego Bay, a white-sand beach resort in the beautiful northeastern part of the island that features two pools, a tennis court, dozens of aquatic activities, and a kids club. 
This deal includes: Round-trip airfare from Washington, D.C.; other departure cities are available Airline taxes and fuel surcharges Hotel transfers Four nights at the Holiday Inn Resort Montego Bay in Jamaica All meals, snacks, and beverages 
How to get this deal: Visit Liberty Travel 's website. Travel at these rates is valid November 16-20, 2015; and must be booked by October 30, 2015. 
Don't forget: Always compare prices from multiple travel providers to make sure that you're getting the best price with this deal. Find Cheap Flights!
